channel.title: Mysql help
channel.description:
how do i setup mysql for the 614 legacy server, it says
[20:04:13] [Server] Connecting to vote4tokens database Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://www.legacy614.org:3306/legacy_vote Unable to connect to MySQL Press any key to continue . . .
any help?

item.description:

i have a new fixed version add me on msn or yahoo ( mihanjeezan@yahoo.com ) or skype (divine_mihan ) source + client

item.title: Mysql help
item.dc:creator: @Kecea Kecea
item.description:
@Kecea wrote:

Remove that Vote4Cash junk.

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql help
item.dc:creator: @darkangel996 darkangel996
item.description:
@darkangel996 wrote:

[quote=“Wintercanon, post:3, topic:383463”][quote author=darkangel996 link=topic=479238.msg3508617#msg3508617 date=1298375724]
download and install xampp
[/quote]No sir.

You need to download MySQL’s J/Connector, a Java library. The class not found exception is your server searching for this library. You cannot connect to a MySQL database (from Java) without it.[/quote]

oh i don’t really use mysql servers so i don’t know much about them

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql help
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“darkangel996, post:2, topic:383463”]download and install xampp[/quote]No sir.

You need to download MySQL’s J/Connector, a Java library. The class not found exception is your server searching for this library. You cannot connect to a MySQL database (from Java) without it.

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql help
item.dc:creator: @darkangel996 darkangel996
item.description:
@darkangel996 wrote:

download and install xampp

Read full topic
